title: Tackling the Climate Crisis at Home and Abroad
summary: Analysis of Executive Order 14008: Tackling the Climate Crisis at Home and Abroad
full_text: Places the climate crisis at the center of United States foreign policy and national security and directs a whole-of-government approach to address climate change.
plain_language_summary: Analysis of Executive Order 14008: Tackling the Climate Crisis at Home and Abroad
executive_brief: Executive Brief for 14008: This executive order signed by President Biden addresses key issues relevant to higher education. Institutions should review compliance requirements and assess operational impacts.
comprehensive_analysis:
Comprehensive Analysis of Executive Order 14008: Tackling the Climate Crisis at Home and Abroad

This executive order addresses several areas of significance to higher education institutions. The order, signed by President Biden, may impact research funding, administrative requirements, and institutional operations. Universities should carefully review this order to determine compliance needs and operational adjustments.
yale_imperative: Yale should monitor implementation guidance and coordinate response through the Office of Research Administration.
what_changed: This order creates moderate compliance requirements and funding opportunities for research universities.
